Summary: Four lighted objects moving eastward sighted over.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were standing on the beach and i looked up and i saw a light that at first ithought was a satellite moving in an easterly direction. i told my friends tolook up and we all saw the first light moving in an easterly direction anddebated about it being a satellite when we saw it jump and zigzag. it was movingfaster than satellite and disappeared in the direction it was going as if itwere leaving the earths atmosphere and going out to space. my friends notedthat it looked like it was floating in an easterly direction. then there wasanother on a different path moving in a similar pattern only more jumpy andzigzagging. then there were two more each on a different path but going in thesame direction and moving in the same manner.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Ciudad Juarez
There were no other sightings in Ciudad Juarez on or around May 6th 2002
